1. Optimization on page list view, displaying 2 pages per row 
2. Quick add doc names when scanning 
3. Smudge tool added to smudge texts when editing 
4. Option to take photos immediately after starting the app. Users might enable this feature in Settings-Scan
5. Upload documents to WebDAV and OwnCloud (Premium only)

1. New "ID Card Mode" enables scanned images to be automatically adapted to papers and ensures a hard-copy-like print-out (Premium only)

What's new:
1. Add QR Code mode, users can scan the QR code to sign in on web
Business version:
2. Group folder creation & authorization setting are now available on the mobile end 
3. Authorization setting adds View Only option under which Members can only view but not download.

Recent Updates:
1. Improvements for Greeting Card module, now supports lassoing. 
2. Greeting Card Sharing Community is added, check how others play around the card module. Share yours to the community to earn c-points 
3. Cloud OCR now supports partial recognition 
4.Russian OCR is on 
5. OCR supports auto linefeed between paragraphs

1.You could import PDF file(s) into CamScanner for management. 
2. Quality of Cloud OCR has been enhanced.
3. We've updated our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy in accordance with the newly issued EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) to make it easier for you to understand what happens to your data and what rights you have as a user.

Update instructions:
1.We've added signature mode to editing. You can extract your signature from hand-written notes to make it more authentic.
2.We've updated our customer service in the sidebar. We now have a question type section and support uploading pictures.
3.We've added a black-white mode for editing photos.
4.We've added edge cropping for the ID card mode. You can modify the edges when cropping.
5.Support multiple keyword search.
6.Support importing screenshots in CamScanner

We've brought some new functions for Premium account.
7.We've added the local only folder. You can put files you don't want to sync in this folder. You can now choose whether or not to sync files to the cloud.

We've brought some new functions for Premium account.

1.We've added signature mode to editing. You can extract your signature from hand-written notes to make it more authentic.
2.We've updated our customer service in the sidebar. We now have a question type section and support uploading pictures.

Update instructions:
1.We've added signature mode to editing. You can extract your signature from hand-written notes to make it more authentic.
2.We've added a black-white mode for editing photos.
3.We've added edge cropping for the ID card mode. You can modify the edges when cropping.
4.Support multiple keyword search.
5.Support importing screenshots in CamScanner
We've brought some new functions for Premium account.
6.We've added the local only folder. You can put files you don't want to sync in this folder. You can now choose whether or not to sync files to the cloud.
Question book mode: you can scan your wrong answers and create a question book.

Update: 
1. We've updated OCR to offer more accurate results. 
2.23+languages for OCR: Afrikaans, Arabic, Bengali, Catalan, Czech, Filipino, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Indonesian, Nepali, Persian, Sanskrit, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese
3. New OCR mode: Take a picture and you can get text recognition immediately. 
4. The Auto mode has been removed from the filters due to its inaccuracy
5. Refer to Earn: you can invite friends to get Premium for free. 

Update for Premium:
6. Collage: you can modify the size and position of all pictures.

1.New OCR mode: Take a picture and you can get text recognition immediately.
2.Refer to Earn optimization: you can invite friends to get Premium for free.

1.Christmas Campaign 
2.UI & UX Improvements

1.Optimized synchronization
2.You may now directly copy or call the numbers displayed in OCR result pages.
3.Support setting Siri shortcuts for documents and folders
4.Business Version support uploading documents to the  root directory
5.The max number of pages of a PDF to be imported has increased to 100; We now also support imports of encrypted PDF files.

1.Bug fix for OneDrive related
2.Optimized synchronization
3.You may now directly copy or call the numbers displayed in OCR result pages.
4.Support setting Siri shortcuts for documents and folders

1. Fixed one upload error when connecting OneDrive.
2. We've added more features under Camscanner Cloud Sync.
Bug fixes
Optimized ID scan mode.  Scan both sides of your ID onto a single page in 1 min, keeping the card’s original size.

Improved UI/UX of basic features.
Fixed bugs.
Enhanced Premium features.

1. You can add a colored stamp in your file: You may try it in Mark -> Add signature
2. Optimized the Restore Purchase feature

1. Set PDF password for confidential files to ensure security.
2. Fixed bugs and improved stability

1. Set PDF password for confidential files to ensure security.
2.Add the Convert Image to Excel feature, easily converting the photo to an excel file

2.Add the Convert Image to Excel feature, easily converting the photo to an excel file
3. Fixed bugs and improved stability

1.ID photo：With this feature, you may now make your own ID photos for passport, driver license and other forms of ID. 
2.Preview is available now when importing photos from album.

1.ID photo：With this feature, you may now make your own ID photos for passport, driver license and other forms of ID.
2.Preview is available now when importing photos from album.

1.You may now import a photo of your ID from Album to generate a scanned copy.
2.This version has made big progress to fix crashes when your phone running out its memory. It is recommended to update ASAP.
